column2: "Regarding the Cuentian Military, they're transitioning to our control without issues."
"Quite a handful have left to become lowly mercenaries or joined opposing splinter factions."
"However, there are Devil Castles still within our domain. They will still remain even if the person who summoned it perished."
"It's a weapon that won't disappear over time, it must be destroyed."
"Although this places a burden on the Guardians, I formally request your assistance..."
"1. Leave it to me."
"2. It's no easy task on your own."
"I would help out, if I was able to use the Buster Tower..."
"Exactly, I agree."
"We were trying to find people who were able to use the Buster Tower. Of course, it's only natural that we found no one who can."
"To take down a Devil Castle, one would need power that is equal to Ephimera."
"The power of the Guardian is capable of moving the Buster Tower without the use of Ephimera. It is already beyond that of the power of Ephimera."
"Hmm... The way you say it gives off a deceptive tone."
"I did not mean anything by that. I only stated the facts. If it sounds as if I'm being deceptive, then perhaps you're feeling uneasy about something?"
"Ah, another retort... Why don't you try giving <%me> a little thanks once in a while?"
"I showed my appreciation by not doubting a single part of your experiences... Was it not up to your tastes, fairy?"
"I had enough!"
"We've also conducted surveys to those who served under Lutz, to figure their motives, but found no foul intentions."
"The general populous in turn, welcome's Harriet's coronation and ascendancy to the throne."
"My uncle would often say things according to his own criteria and would often make unreasonable demands due to the rebellion..."
"In other words, everyone accepted Harriet's revolution?"
"No, I'm sure that isn't the only reason. It became a fight for the throne in the end, so they were likely following the winner of the outcome."
"Cuent is not monolithic. In addition to Lutz, there were others who benefited from power of Ephimera."
"Those who agree with our way of thinking by word of mouth and not in their hearts, will wait for the opportunity to strike."
"That is why we must stay vigilant."
"Thank you for the report. I ask for your continued reporting on this matter."
